text: Aihika ani maranottara jivanacya acaranala, ani tumhala anathanvisayi vicaratata. Tyanna tumhi sanga ki tyanci bhala'i karaneca uttama ahe. Jara tumhi apale dhana tyancya dhana-sampattita misaluna ghyala tari te tumace bandhava aheta. Va'ita irada rakhanara ani neka irada rakhanara sarvannaca allaha purnapane janato ani allahane icchile asate tara tumhala adacanita (kasta-yataneta) takale asate. Nihsansaya, sarvasrestha allaha motha jabaradasta ani hikamatasali ahe
